project.name: C-C120D-WIRE-08-ST03-DT04-DF12-CF19-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added a Socket Server to accept communication from untrusted source. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C120D-WIRE-08-ST03-DT04-DF12-CF19-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: Open saved .pcap file Has a fixed stack buffer of size 64, allocated within a struct (char [64])

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="AAA" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C120D-WIRE-08-ST03-DT04-DF12-CF19-01-BAD-02
iopair.description: Has a fixed stack buffer of size 64, allocated within a struct (char [64])

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="This is probably going to overflow a buffer of some sort. Let's run it anyway and see what happens. I hope that everything turns out ok, because I would love to see what this looks like in all CAPS. Converting ASCII characters to upper case is easy, you can either call a system function, or just add the standard difference between the start of the two character sets. But, I am sure there is a reason that system functions exist for this sort of functionality." --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_eSKXqUcH5M0dawsqfQBn AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (segfault_code_DWTTjMcy80 OR segfault_code_Qy2t4qiOXw OR segfault_code_XcFEbn5BHW OR segfault_code_8GUQHM6d2J OR segfault_code_W7gck2zjsU OR segfault_msg_9SY1xXwbMw OR illegal_inst_msg_mCmMGd9pqb) AND NOT timeout_tJlSl2XoE7) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((segfault_code_DWTTjMcy80 OR segfault_code_Qy2t4qiOXw OR segfault_code_XcFEbn5BHW OR segfault_code_8GUQHM6d2J OR segfault_code_W7gck2zjsU OR segfault_msg_9SY1xXwbMw OR illegal_inst_msg_mCmMGd9pqb) OR timeout_tJlSl2XoE7 OR controlled_exit_w5j8EsWHzT)))

(NOT PERFORMER AND (segfault_code_DWTTjMcy80 OR segfault_code_Qy2t4qiOXw OR segfault_code_XcFEbn5BHW OR segfault_code_8GUQHM6d2J OR segfault_code_W7gck2zjsU OR segfault_msg_9SY1xXwbMw OR illegal_inst_msg_mCmMGd9pqb) AND NOT timeout_tJlSl2XoE7) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((segfault_code_DWTTjMcy80 OR segfault_code_Qy2t4qiOXw OR segfault_code_XcFEbn5BHW OR segfault_code_8GUQHM6d2J OR segfault_code_W7gck2zjsU OR segfault_msg_9SY1xXwbMw OR illegal_inst_msg_mCmMGd9pqb) OR timeout_tJlSl2XoE7 OR controlled_exit_w5j8EsWHzT))
